text: Imi vana vaAdam! Musave munoita kuti Shaitwaan (Satani) akunyengedzei, sekubuditsa kwaakaita vabereki venyu (Adam naHawwa (Evha)) muParadhiso, achivabvisa mbatya dzavo, kuti avaratidze nhengo dzavo dzakavandika. Zvirokwazvo, iye nedzinza rake vanokuonai vari kwamusingakwanise kuvaona. Zvirokwazvo, takaita kuti vanaDhiyabhorosi vave shamwari dzeavo vasingatendi
